revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 66:;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Peteesis, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 8;;Keras, son of Sisois through the agency of Tauris (Pykta);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 4 obol 1.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 15) eparourion drachmas 2 obols 5, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos drachmas 9 obols 4;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 10 obols 5, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 3 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 48 obols 15.;(Pachon) 22 likewise:;Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Kastor, his son, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Heron, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, drachmas 8;;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Petalion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petalion, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Harsiesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, uperetes,;guard tax drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 52;;(Pachon) 23 likewise:;Horion, son of Maron, grandson of Horion, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 16;;Ptollas, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221);;Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, obols 28;;Leouas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 4;;Tamystha, daughter of Menches (Kolkalos);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 9) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Aunchis, drachmas 24 obols 28;;Herakleides, son of Esouris, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taonnophris, copper tetradrachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 96 obols 6.;(Pachon) 24 likewise:;Phaesis, son of Sisois, grandson of Phaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 16 obols 28;;Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Aphrodous, daughter of Horos (Apynchis, son of Pnepheros);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 25) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3;\;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 2 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obol 0.5;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
